  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/831</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/831</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'ampliació de la Unió Europea</string>
            <string language="en">The enlargement of the European Union</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Vergrößerung des europäischen Anschlußes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'agrandissement de l'union européenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ampliação da união européia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ingrandimento di Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διεύρυνση της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que ens informa sobre l'ampliació l'any 2004 de la Unió Europea, amb els nous països incorporats. Conté un mapa i enllaços per ampliar la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the enlargement of the European Union in 2004 and the candidate countries. It includes a map and links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Unió Europea</string>
            <string language="en">EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">organització internacional</string>
            <string language="en">international organisation</string>
            <string language="es">organización internacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der
Vergrößerung des europäischen Anschlußes 2004 und der 
Bewerberländer. Sie schließt eine Karte und Links für weitere
Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur 
l'agrandissement de l'union européenne en 2004 et des pays de 
candidat. Il inclut une carte et des liens pour de plus amples 
informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na ampliação da 
união européia em 2004 e dos países do candidato. Inclui um 
mapa e as ligações para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sull'ingrandimento di 
Unione Europea in 2004 e dei paesi del candidato. Include un 
programma ed i collegamenti per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στη διεύρυνση της Ευρωπαϊκής
Ένωσης το 2004 και των χωρών υποψηφίων. Περιλαμβάνει 
έναν χάρτη και τις συνδέσεις για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">internationale Organisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">organisation internationale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">organização internacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">UE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">organizzazione internazionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ΕΕ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διεθνής οργανισμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
